name: First Project - Tap Tetris (Android)
description:
A different take on a classic game. Form up lines and columns to clear the blocks, adding time to your counter. Let's see how long you can last. :)

There is a bit of a story behind this game. It is basically my first attempt to a published game and a piece for my portfolio.
Every aspect of the game was created by me. Let me know what you think for future updates.
